subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – originally an ''[[acorn]]''. The character acquired its current meaning of ''[[white]]'' from the color of the acorn’s flesh. The original meaning has been lost. (Compare {{zh-l|*自}} – originally “nose”, now “self”.)

subSections.title: Etymology

subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=bái,bó

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|しろ|yomi=k}}
From {{inh|ja|ojp|-}} *{{IPAfont|siro<sub>1</sub>-}} ~ {{IPAfont|sira}}<ref>[http://npcmj.ninjal.ac.jp/interfaces/cgi-bin/dictionary.sh?search=l007006b&part=n&db=oncoj sira & sirwo-] at Oxford-NINJAL Corpus of Old Japanese</ref>

subSections.title: Derived terms
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|しら}}

# [[white]], Old Japanese pronunciation, now only seen in compounds

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|白%髪|しら%が}}: white hair
* {{ja-r|白%鳥|しら%とり}}: swan
* {{ja-r|白%羽|しら%は}}: white feather
* {{ja-r|白%地|しら%じ}}: white background
* {{ja-r|白%樺|しら%かば}}: Japanese white birch
* {{ja-r|白%木|しら%き}}: plain wood, unfinished woodwork
* {{ja-r|白%雪|しら%ゆき}}: white snow
* {{ja-r|白%旗|しら%はた}}: white flag
* {{ja-r|白%浜|しら%はま}}: white sandy beach
* {{ja-r|白%壁|しら%かべ}}: white plaster wall
* {{ja-r|白%子|しら%こ}}: soft roe, milt
* {{ja-r|白%百合|しら%ゆり}}: white lily
* {{ja-r|白%糸|しら%いと}}: white thread
* {{ja-r|白%菊|しら%ぎく}}: white chrysanthemum
* {{ja-r|白%鷺|しら%さぎ}}: generic name for herons with all-white plumage (inc. egrets)
* {{ja-r|白%州|しら%す}}, {{ja-r|白%洲|しら%す}}, {{ja-r|白%沙|しら%す}}: bar of white sand
* {{ja-r|白%梅|しら%うめ}}: white plum blossoms;  white Japanese apricot;  white-blossomed plum
* {{ja-r|白%む|しら%む}}: to grow light;  to become white;  to turn grey (gray)
* {{ja-r|白%雲|しら%くも}}: white clouds
* {{ja-r|白%玉|しら%たま}}: white gem (e.g. pearl)
* {{ja-r|白%玉%椿|しら%たま%つばき}}: common camellia
* {{ja-r|白%ける|しら%ける}}:
* {{ja-r|白%子干し|しら%すぼし}}: dried young sardines
* {{ja-r|白%刃|しら%は}}: drawn sword, naked sword
* {{ja-r|白%滝|しら%たき}}: sheet-like waterfall
* {{ja-r|白%茶ける|しら%ちゃける}}: to fade,  to discolor
* {{ja-r|白%白しい|しら%じらし.い}}, {{ja-r|白%々しい|しら%じらし.い}}: pure-white, very clear
* {{ja-r|白%魚|しら%うお}}: icefish
* {{ja-r|白%帆|しら%ほ}}: white sail
* {{ja-r|白%露|しら%つゆ}}: glistening dew
* {{ja-r|白%砂|しら%すな}}: white sand
* {{ja-r|白%太|しら%た}}: sapwood
* {{ja-r|白%癩|しら%はたけ}}: vitiligo
* {{ja-r|白%絹|しら%ぎぬ}}: white silk
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Related terms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|白い|しろい}} (Adjective form)
* {{ja-r|白を切る|しら を きる}}

subSections.title: Han character
Compounds
